现在有啥云服务器优惠吗？用来挂些小软件，嘿嘿~
你们都在哪买的 onedrive?

praetorian-inc /

      gokart---A static analysis tool for securing Go code

AsuharietYgvar /

      AppleNeuralHash2ONNX---Convert Apple NeuralHash model for CSAM Detection to ONNX.

babysor /

      Realtime-Voice-Clone-Chinese---🚀AI拟声: 5秒内克隆您的声音并生成任意语音内容 Clone a voice in 5 seconds to generate arbitrary speech in real-time

spring-projects /

      spring-authorization-server---A community-driven project led by the Spring Security team and is focused on delivering Authorization Server support to the Spring community

NvChad /

      NvChad---An attempt to make neovim cli as functional as an IDE while being very beautiful , blazing fast.

SerenityOS /

      serenity---The Serenity Operating System 🐞

flutter /

      flutter---Flutter makes it easy and fast to build beautiful apps for mobile and beyond.

doocs /

      source-code-hunter---😱 从源码层面，剖析挖掘互联网行业主流技术的底层实现原理，为广大开发者 “提升技术深度” 提供便利。目前开放 Spring 全家桶，Mybatis、Netty、Dubbo 框架，及 Redis、Tomcat 中间件等

onnx /

      onnx---Open standard for machine learning interoperability

public-api-lists /

      public-api-lists---A collective list of free APIs for use in software and web development 🚀

jonaslejon /

      malicious-pdf---Generate a bunch of malicious pdf files with phone-home functionality. Can be used with Burp Collaborator

YehLi /

      xmodaler---X-modaler is a versatile and high-performance codebase for cross-modal analytics.

Qv2ray /

      Qv2ray---⭐ Linux / Windows / macOS 跨平台 V2Ray 客户端 | 支持 VMess / VLESS / SSR / Trojan / Trojan-Go / NaiveProxy / HTTP / HTTPS / SOCKS5 | 使用 C++ / Qt 开发 | 可拓展插件式设计 ⭐

0voice /

      Introduction-to-Golang---【未来服务器端编程语言】最全空降golang资料补给包（满血战斗），包含文章，书籍，作者论文，理论分析，开源框架，云原生，大佬视频，大厂实战分享ppt

reuven /

      oreilly-2021-q3-first-steps---

labmlai /

      annotated_deep_learning_paper_implementations---🧑‍🏫 Implementations/tutorials of deep learning papers with side-by-side notes 📝; including transformers (original, xl, switch, feedback, vit), optimizers (adam, radam, adabelief), gans(dcgan, cyclegan, stylegan2), 🎮 reinforcement learning (ppo, dqn), capsnet, distillation, etc. 🧠

cncf /

      mentoring---👩🏿‍🎓👨🏽‍🎓👩🏻‍🎓CNCF Mentoring + CommunityBridge + Summer of Code

nlohmann /

      json---JSON for Modern C++

lutzroeder /

      netron---Visualizer for neural network, deep learning, and machine learning models

sachaos /

      viddy---👀 Modern watch command. Time machine and pager etc.

dromara /

      Sa-Token---这可能是史上功能最全的Java权限认证框架，权限架构设计的绝佳实践！目前已集成——登录认证、权限认证、分布式Session会话、微服务网关鉴权、单点登录、OAuth2.0、踢人下线、Redis集成、前后台分离、记住我模式、模拟他人账号、临时身份切换、账号封禁、多账号认证体系、注解式鉴权、路由拦截式鉴权、花式token生成、自动续签、同端互斥登录、会话治理、密码加密、jwt集成、Spring集成、WebFlux集成...

ClickHouse /

      ClickHouse---ClickHouse® is a free analytics DBMS for big data

tenacityteam /

      tenacity---Tenacity is an easy-to-use, privacy-friendly, FLOSS, cross-platform multi-track audio editor/recorder for Windows, macOS, Linux and other operating systems. Contributions welcome!

LaravelDaily /

      laravel-tips---Awesome tips for Laravel

go-sql-driver /

      mysql---Go MySQL Driver is a MySQL driver for Go's (golang) database/sql package
